name: CrazyTap
description: A timer gives you 10 seconds to place as many spheres on a blank wall without clicking on any previously placed ones. You can toggle a "draw mode" on and off to have the ball stick when placed or be freely moving around via. gravity and collision with other balls. You can also toggle "hold mode" which disables the timer and lets you rapidly place hundreds of spheres on the wall by holding the mouse button.
